meanings.definition: A group of people considered to be on the fringes of respectable society.
meanings.sent1: In the demimonde, you may find artists, actors, and other unconventional individuals.
meanings.sent2: The demimonde often includes those who challenge societal norms.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the demimonde brought a unique energy with their colorful outfits and eccentric personalities.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she belonged to a demimonde of dreamers and rebels, living on the edge of society.
meanings.sent5: The demimonde was a vibrant mix of misfits and free spirits, creating their own world within society.

meanings.definition: A class of women on the fringes of respectable society.
meanings.sent1: The demimonde of the city included women who worked in cabarets and theaters.
meanings.sent2: Historically, the demimonde faced both admiration and disdain from society.
meanings.sent3: The demimonde ladies added a touch of mystery to the social scene with their enigmatic smiles.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as part of a demimonde of independent women, unbound by societal expectations.
meanings.sent5: The demimonde women moved with grace and confidence, owning their place in the world.
